Player History
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/3/1988 to a minor league contract.
Had first career hit on 9/8/1989, off Jamie Moyer (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1990, off David Palmer (MON)...
Hit for the cycle against Pittsburgh on 4/3/1991...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Diego on 8/10/1991...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1991, hitting .299 with 7 HR, 27 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/1991, hitting .480 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,278,571 through salary arbitration...
